content.raw:
this might not be a very good news, but there is a huge memory leak that appears when models are spawned while there are double pendulums, i've made the pose/stamped subscriber 'latch' the messages, but there is still, so if anyone notices anything that could be the reason for the leak.
![leak.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/3687351920-leak.png)

content.raw:
Hi, I've added a PR to gazebojs that could be considered a workaround if we want to get thing to work for now, this PR will let us retrieve materials and models the same way the old gzbrdige was doing it ,until we adopt gzweb to gazebojs behavior,
[Link PR31](Link #!/osrf/gazebojs/pull-requests/31/added-the-two-functions-needed-for-gazebow/diff)
content.html: Hi, I've added a PR to gazebojs that could be considered a workaround if we want to get thing to work for now, this PR will let us retrieve materials and models the same way the old gzbrdige was doing it ,until we adopt gzweb to gazebojs behavior, Link PR31

content.raw:
I've been getting some portobuf error message from gzbridge whenever I insert a box:

~~~
Received Message: {"op":"publish","id":"publish:~/factory:15","topic":"~/factory","msg":{"name":"box_0","type":"box","createEntity":1,"position":{"x":1.5505497455596924,"y":-0.022723402827978134,"z":0.5},"orientation":{"w":1,"x":0,"y":0,"z":0}}} from http://localhost:8080 ::1
[libprotobuf ERROR google/protobuf/wire_format.cc:1053] String field contains invalid UTF-8 data when parsing a protocol buffer. Use the 'bytes' type if you intend to send raw bytes.
~~~

The box doesn't show up. I haven't had time to look into it yet. Not sure if anyone's seen this problem.
content.html:
I've been getting some portobuf error message from gzbridge whenever I insert a box:

Received Message: {"op":"publish","id":"publish:~/factory:15","topic":"~/factory","msg":{"name":"box_0","type":"box","createEntity":1,"position":{"x":1.5505497455596924,"y":-0.022723402827978134,"z":0.5},"orientation":{"w":1,"x":0,"y":0,"z":0}}} from http://localhost:8080 ::1
[libprotobuf ERROR google/protobuf/wire_format.cc:1053] String field contains invalid UTF-8 data when parsing a protocol buffer. Use the 'bytes' type if you intend to send raw bytes.

The box doesn't show up. I haven't had time to look into it yet. Not sure if anyone's seen this problem.

content.html: This if statement is not doing anything. Can it be removed?

the choppy pendulum was due to the strict f
ilter that was applied -min age 0.1 sec-, i restored the old values of the pose filter and it doesn't look choppy anymore.

content.raw: how about gzweb 2.0
content.html: how about gzweb 2.0

content.raw: I'm not against the idea of a new target branch, especially if it helps the review. We should also have a versioning scheme for gzweb, that takes into consideration the gazebo and node versions.
content.html: I'm not against the idea of a new target branch, especially if it helps the review. We should also have a versioning scheme for gzweb, that takes into consideration the gazebo and node versions.

content.raw: The choppy poses are due to aggressive pose filter settings (gzbridge.js line 23). Not sure what's going on with lights and materials
content.html: The choppy poses are due to aggressive pose filter settings (gzbridge.js line 23). Not sure what's going on with lights and materials

content.raw: The default values here are a little aggressive, and this results in weird animation (for example, a double pendulum looks like its arms a not well connected). Please change those to something like `{timeElapsed : 0.025, distance: 0.005, quaternion: 0.005}` to improve the smoothness.
content.html: The default values here are a little aggressive, and this results in weird animation (for example, a double pendulum looks like its arms a not well connected). Please change those to something like {timeElapsed : 0.025, distance: 0.005, quaternion: 0.005} to improve the smoothness.

content.raw: I think it's a good start. ideally we should address as many of these issues as possible before merging. Otherwise we could create a new branch as the target of this PR so that we don't leave the `default` branch in a half working state.
content.html: I think it's a good start. ideally we should address as many of these issues as possible before merging. Otherwise we could create a new branch as the target of this PR so that we don't leave the default branch in a half working state.

content.raw: It works on my desktop (gazebojs 7.0.1, gazebo 7.3.1 installed from debs, node 4.4.7). However there are issues, especially if `deploy -m` is not done beforehand.
content.html: It works on my desktop (gazebojs 7.0.1, gazebo 7.3.1 installed from debs, node 4.4.7). However there are issues, especially if deploy -m is not done beforehand.

content.raw: paused and wallTime are const, so this is a runtime error (lines 97-98)
content.html: paused and wallTime are const, so this is a runtime error (lines 97-98)

content.raw: lastPausedState and paused should not be const if they are assigned to.
content.html: lastPausedState and paused should not be const if they are assigned to.

content.raw:
Nice! This loads for me with Gazebo 8. Some details I noticed:

* Pose updates are very choppy, the double pendulum gets disassembled.
* Gazebo materials are not working, the simple shapes should be gray, the cabinet should have a wooden texture...
* Some other materials don't work either. The houses, the simple arm...
* Are lights working?
* Collisions are showing up white
content.html:
Nice! This loads for me with Gazebo 8. Some details I noticed:

  • Pose updates are very choppy, the double pendulum gets disassembled.
  • Gazebo materials are not working, the simple shapes should be gray, the cabinet should have a wooden texture...
  • Some other materials don't work either. The houses, the simple arm...
  • Are lights working?
  • Collisions are showing up white

content.raw: If anyone has experienced any kind of error during running, please post the error msg with gazebojs ver and gzserver ver, thanks.
content.html: If anyone has experienced any kind of error during running, please post the error msg with gazebojs ver and gzserver ver, thanks.
